title: Crime Alert 10.16.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.16.18
description:
Police bust a former American Idol contestant for allegedly dealing heroin. Cops find 11 infant bodies in ceiling of a funeral home.  The so - called cough syrup killer changes his plea.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
